Palo: Your AI-Powered YouTube Assistant
Save time on long YouTube videos — get instant, high-quality summaries, precise navigation, and interactive insights, all within the video page.

🔥 Top Features:
💰 Completely FREE
✅ Instant Video Summaries: Grasp the main ideas in seconds.
🎨 Customize with your choice of theme!
✅ Key Insights Extraction: Highlight important points for quick comprehension.
⭐Smart Speed and Focus Features!⭐
✅ Timestamped Navigation: Jump straight to the sections that matter most.
✅ Multilingual Support: Summaries and translations in 100+ languages.
✅ Privacy-Focused: All data processed locally for user safety.
✅ Unlimited Access Across Devices: Use Palo on Chrome, iOS, and Android.

How Palo Works:
- Install the Palo Extension.
- Navigate to any YouTube video.
- Start saving time and learning more—get your summary, navigate key points, and ask follow-up questions seamlessly.

Perfect for:
*Educational content (lectures, tutorials, documentaries)
*Podcasts and interviews
*Business, Investing, and Research videos
*Tech, Science, and News

🔄 Continuous Improvements:
Palo is always growing, improving accuracy, and enhancing features to deliver the best possible YouTube viewing experience.
Upgrade your YouTube interactions — Install Palo today!
